mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO reginfo_cng ( cng_req_no, stdnt_no, req_de, process_stat, proc_date, refuse_resn,
atch_file_no,
req_cl_code, req_resn_code, cng_bgnde, cng_endde, cng_year, cng_semstr ) VALUES ( REG_CNG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{bo_writer, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, 'DG', NULL, NULL,
(SELECT MAX(atch_file_no) + 1 FROM attach),
'JT', #{req_resn_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL )
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY req_de desc) rn, cng_req_no, (SELECT com_code_nm FROM tb_com_code WHERE CODE_GRP = (SELECT CODE_GRP FROM TB_CODE_GRP WHERE CODE_GRP_NM = 'REQ_RESN_CODE') AND com_code = req_resn_code) req_resn_code, TO_CHAR(req_de, 'RRRR.MM.DD') req_de, CASE WHEN atch_file_no IS NOT NULL THEN '제출완료' ELSE '미제출' END AS papers_submit_at, (SELECT com_code_nm FROM tb_com_code WHERE CODE_GRP = (SELECT CODE_GRP FROM TB_CODE_GRP WHERE CODE_GRP_NM = 'PROCESS_STAT') AND com_code = process_stat) process_stat FROM reginfo_cng WHERE stdnt_no=#{stdnt_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND req_cl_code='JT'

SELECT a.cng_req_no, TO_CHAR(req_de, 'RRRR.MM.DD') req_de, (SELECT com_code_nm FROM tb_com_code WHERE CODE_GRP = (SELECT CODE_GRP FROM TB_CODE_GRP WHERE CODE_GRP_NM = 'PROCESS_STAT') AND com_code = process_stat) process_stat, TO_CHAR(proc_date, 'RRRR.MM.DD') proc_date, req_resn_code, a.atch_file_no, atch_file_seq, file_path, file_nm, file_cont_type, file_size, reg_date, reg_user_id, biz_type, save_file_nm FROM reginfo_cng a LEFT OUTER JOIN attach b ON(a.atch_file_no=b.atch_file_no) WHERE a.stdnt_no=#{stdnt_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.cng_req_no=${cng_req_no}
